description:
"Hey, everybody's curious!"
That's what Jake had to say on his first visit with us.
On his second visit, that "curiousness" led him to fucking the shit out of Ross — who had returned after a long absence and was quite eager to get fucked!
Fortunately, Jake's curious streak now brings us to a super hot flip-flop-fuck with Mitch!
And, to start things out, Jake get's a taste of Mitch's ass...
title: Jake & Mitch
